Documentation¶

Plume Classes¶

cwipp.Plume

Parent Plume class.

cwipp.LESplume

Child Plume class used for simulated plumes (non-predictive mode).

cwipp.MODplume

Child Plume class used for modelled plumes (predictive mode)

Plume Base Class Methods¶

Common methods, which apply to all plumes.

Plume.get_I

Finds cross-wind fireline intensity parameter I

Plume.get_wf

Finds characteristic time (Tau) and velocity (wf) scales.

Plume.classify

Classifies the plume as penetrative (True) or boundary layer (False)

LESplume Class Methods¶

These methods can be applied for plumes with full cross-sectional data available from numerical simulations.

LESplume.get_zCL

Extracts mean injection height from LES.

MODplume Class Methods¶

Methods that apply to plumes without full cross-sectional data available (a.k.a forecast mode).

MODplume.iterate

Applies iterative solution to parameterize plume injection height

MODplume.explicit_solution

Applies explicit solution to parameterize plume injection height
